notes: Account signals deliberately weighted lower (0.25) to avoid discrimination against new users
Signal quality prioritized (0.35) to emphasize content value over identity
Behavioral signals (0.20) focus on abuse patterns, not user characteristics
Content features (0.20) use length and basic toxicity, avoiding subjective judgment
monitoring: Monthly review of score distribution by topic
Quarterly bias audit comparing scores across user segments
Annual recalibration based on governance feedback
